lenders.name: abiola
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: Health care

lenders.name: Shakespeare
lenders.occupation: Starting my own business in the food industry
lenders.loan_because: It has been 4 years in the making and I need some funding to finish. I started my own business called Hummilicious. We make hummus, cheesecakes and crackers. We are set to launch in almost 25 stores to start, but need additional funding other than my own pocket.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a employed full time as I try to finance my business that I have started,  I am hard working, honest and enjoy meeting new people. The start of this business has been exciting for me. Although there is a lot of hard work involved I have met a lot of new people that I would  not have met otherwise. When I get to share my business with other's they can feel the excitement and energy as well. I have a staff set up in place worldwide due to meeting people these people at different places. Maybe you are the next person to become part of our growing to team. A small donation/ on lending hand  is all that is needed to be considered part of our team. Please help my dream become a reality. Lend a hand today!

lenders.name: laon
lenders.loan_because: no deposit casinos, casino games, money, win

lenders.occupational_info: How would I describe my work?  When people apply for government welfare benefits, I apply the rules and decide if they are eligible for the benefits.

lenders.name: Rocklin
lenders.loan_because: being able to give was the greatest gift given to us.

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: money is not mine to keep. Money makes things possible in this world and so rather than store it, I would like others to be able to use the money that passes through my hands for the good of their family, friends and community.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach teenagers.

lenders.name: Sistacares
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women who are taking the first steps to help themselves.

lenders.name: Laila
lenders.loan_because: I love people who not only dream, but go about the business of living those dreams. I am thrilled to have discovered this opportunity to help.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with animals, mostly dogs. I cut their hair and see to their good hygiene. As silly as it seems, I even put bows in their hair and paint their toe nails! It is very hard work, but I do love it. 

I especially love to groom dogs who are considered 'bad'. It's a wonderful feeling when they allow me to handle them when they won't let anyone else. They are the ones who really need help and that's why they are so special to me.

lenders.occupational_info: My company: Developers Land for Residential and Commercial Projects, Constructs Homes and Buildings Residential / Commercial, Investment Club, Casino Projects, Market and Sell everything Real Estate.

lenders.loan_because: this is such a fabulous idea - not a band aid solution but a means to help people overcome their poverty. A very well organised system
lenders.occupational_info: Secondary School Teacher

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: this is a better way to help people than simple charity

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I live in a country where opportunity is around every corner with just a little hard work. I would hope that each person across the globe would be able to experience that sort of chance to make something for themselves. That spirit of going out on your own and being a success is what makes a person and a people free. I want others to have what I have had a chance to experience.

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because: I love the impact such a small action can have.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: this is a loan in honor of my Dad for Father's Day 2009.  He is an  honorable,  kind,  supportive, generous, patient, tolerant and loving man who I adore with all my heart!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people fulfill their dream of owning a home or selling their home.

lenders.name: jacquelyn
lenders.occupational_info: I live below the poverty rate myself right now. I am a single mom of an 11 year old, and will graduate with a bsw in may of 2010. I am interested in many social justice issues. Having experienced many injustices related to poverty myself, I hope that I will be in a position to help others at some point. The poverty that I have dealt with is nothing compared to what a lot of other people in the world live with, but I do understand some of the powerlessness and lack of respect that many people experience. I have had countless demeaning and demoralizing experiences with the powers that be, right here in Buffalo New York. It will be great to have a decent job when I graduate, but I want to do something more than just go to work everyday and collect a paycheck. Wish me luck! Maybe someday in the future, I'll be able to help you turn things around for yourself too.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I am no longer loaning because of animal cruelty that is being supported on this site

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I see it as a great way to help people, and make an income that is considered small in my community do great things overseas. As a Christian, I believe in blessing and showing love to others. I also see microloans as a sustainable means of helping those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I use computers to design printed materials and to facilitate printing at the small printing company where I work.

lenders.name: Ammar
lenders.occupation: Master degree of Nursing Services Administration

lenders.loan_because: i want to start again my business which  was left hanging due to lack of funds.
lenders.occupational_info: i am the administrative assistant of a convention center here in cebu.

lenders.name: Alexander & Bettina

lenders.occupational_info: I have a fun and interesting job which allows me to learn something new every day

lenders.name: Szilvia

lenders.loan_because: I want to honour the life of our son Matthew who passed over in Feb 09

lenders.name: Dmitriy

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I would like to honor my Father who passed away in 2008.  He was a great gardener, carpenter, and cook who loved children and was always ready to help anyone in need.  My loans are made in memory of his loving and generous spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a costume designer for the theatre and dance.  I hope that, through my work, I'm able to inspire, educate, or just entertain people.  I've been fortunate to travel around much of the world and have been humbled by my encounters with all of the amazing people I've met.

lenders.name: Cam
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and because of a wondeful gift, I have been introduced to and given the opportunity to share with others through KIVA

"A Parish united to praise, worship,
and spread the word of the Lord,
by sharing the gifts that God has given us."
(Mission Statement 2005)

lenders.name: Hannie
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: moey
lenders.loan_because: Tiny acorns become mighty oaks.

lenders.name: Roxana
lenders.loan_because: I respect those who strive to support themselves and their families and make a decent living, wherever they are.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I want to give many people a chance to do great things.
lenders.occupational_info: I wiork with students (6th and 7th grade) with social and emotional disabilities.

lenders.name: Kevin Duff
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we have a duty to serve the global good. We are the luckiest of the luckiest and should be obliged to help those less fortunate. We did not earn our life; we were born into it. Unlike us, the majority of the world is destitute, living in absolute poverty, without access to food, proper sanitation or clean drinking water. Our generation needs to put forth a bona fide effort to make change happen, to promote global equity. In years past, civilizations have been chastised for human rights atrocities: slavery, massacre, and imperialism to name but a few. Could our lack of action be just as wicked. Will we be likened to our historical malefactors, not for our evil actions but our blind apathy?
lenders.occupational_info: I just finished a masters degree in physiotherapy and will be working locally for a year before travelling abroad to work as a physiotherapist in low income countries. Afterwards, I plan on returning to school to pursue advanced training in Global Health.

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I care about other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a major university in the midwestern part of the United States. I am in charge of the libraries at this university.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowerment and ownership

lenders.name: Boram
lenders.loan_because:
It's a great idea. 
If I can help other people with this and they can do what they want, it will be my pleasure.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm teaching English and also learning it, so I'm spending almost all day on being with lovely kids.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.occupational_info: I help people learn to communicate better - especially speaking to groups.

lenders.name: Friends of John John & Tia

lenders.occupational_info: Before I retired I worked at several universities in the Faculty of Business.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because:
It's a small step towards something with a huge impact. It's a good feeling to help people that want to improve their lives but don't have all the necessary means to do so. As a student that's owning much in government loans for my studies, I still feel I live a privileged lifestyle and would like to contribute what I can to help others in need. My parents were raised in Viet Nam and I grew up with stories of their humble lifestyle; so it feels nice to help someone who is similarly in my parents' previous situation to improve their life. We all deserve to live a life of happiness and freedom from financial worries.

“Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'”
- Martin Luther King, Jr
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently in the UK studying Optometry

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to help lend a helping hand to a deserving, hardworking fellow citizen of the world.

lenders.occupational_info: La empresa que solía trabajar para el que está haciendo mal a causa de malversación de fondos y negligencia. Mis ahorros para la jubilación diezmados por gran parte de la misma en el gobierno y el sector financiero.

lenders.name: Savannah
lenders.loan_because: This is the best way I've heard about to directly help someone who needs money somewhere in the world, and it never has to end. Once you get repaid by one borrower, you can turn around and lend it to someone else in a never ending cycle.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with newspapers, radio stations and television stations when a state has received federal disaster assistance to inform the public of how they can get funds to help them recover.

lenders.name: John and Sandy
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to pass some of that blessing on to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to play the piano.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is an incredible organization that helps others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I study how your everyday environment influences how your body functions at the cellular level.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a leg up sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info: We manufacture medical devices which help relieve pain.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I believe in investing for the future can happen by investing in people today.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a store where we sell general merchandise including apparel, food and other goods.

lenders.name: pinkzibra
lenders.loan_because: small acts transform the world.

lenders.name: RJS
lenders.loan_because: I can't do much, but lend what I can because others need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in co-operative, member owned grocery store which also has a delicatessen and hot food for sale. I cook in the kitchen and also help manage the staff of twelve people who also work with me.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do...If I have, then I must share.
lenders.occupational_info: I, along with my colleagues provide emergency rescue services to the public.

lenders.name: Rhino
lenders.loan_because: I care about the entrepreneurs in developing nations and am seeking out entrepreneurs that are involved in the safe guarding and promotion of wildlife, like African Rhinos.
lenders.occupational_info: Rhino Web Services is a full featured website optimization company based in Charlotte, NC. We specialize in optimizing and building Internet sites that result in better organic search rankings and are easily updated and provide analytic metrics. Your site should not just work, it should work for you.
